name: Chucaro
content:
Chucaro

Maiden of Haze and Whimsy

Source Inner Sea Gods pg. 322
Pathfinder Wiki Chucaro

Details

Alignment CG
Pantheon Empyreal Lords
Areas of Concern Dreams, hallucinations, mists
Domains Chaos, Good, Madness, Magic
Subdomains Azata (Chaos), Azata (Good), Insanity, Revelry, Whimsy
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Morningstar
Symbol Eye with rainbow iris
Sacred Animal(s) Bird of paradise
Sacred Color(s) White

Obedience

Drape yourself in gauze and eat hallucinogenic mushrooms or fungi while meditating on the teachings of Chucaro. Gain a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws against poison.

Boons - Celestial Obedience

Mystery Cultist

Source Chronicle of the Righteous pg. 10
1: Kaleidoscopic Images (Sp) color spray 3/day, hypnotic pattern 2/day, or gaseous form 1/day
2: Wispy Form (Su) Your body becomes misty when you are under attack, diluting the damage of edged weapons. Though outwardly you appear the same, you gain DR 5/bludgeoning.
3: Terrible Reverie (Sp) You can cast weird once per day.

For Followers of Chucaro

Feats

Heroic Interposition

Traits

Empyreal Focus
